sections.content:
• While in college, I learned about programming and development from a friend of mine. Ever since that experience, I immediately knew that development was my passion and I've been creating ever since.
  • I joined a web development and design program to give myself a leg up and to solidify my knowledge.

• I enjoy reading books about various topics including Psychology, Biology, History, Economics, and various fiction novels as well.
  • I apply the things that I learn by seeing how they can help me approach and solve problems.

• University of South Alabama | Bachelor of English
  • Double Major, completed 140 credit hours. Graduated in May 2022
  • President's list for two years. Vice President of Tau Kappa Epsilon Fraternity.

• Developer Portfolio version 4
  • Croatian Coasts and Riche Fashion Layouts.
  • PHP and JS coding Challenges from Exercises for Programmers 4.
  • Responsive Layout Garden.
  • Weather Forecast API project.

• Education internship Jan 2022 - May 2022. Taught 8th Grade English for a semester.
  • Front-End developer - Crebbits | August 2022 - Current
  • Currently creating a game website for Crebbits the accounting card game. Releases October 2022.
